about_the_game:
The demo has nearly the same functionality like the game.
Only the vehicles are limited to 7 of over 50 ^^

Have fun and if you found some bugs, please let me know, so I can fix them.
Shouldn´t be much bugs, because the most of them I have already fixed ^^
